turns.utterance: My favorites classes in school were Science and Math. How about you?
turns.response: I am pretty sure my favorite was the end of the day

turns.utterance: You didn't like school at all? Everyone has one class they liked.
turns.response: Not really so much, especially in High School, if I could have went to school without all of the nasty other kids I might have been fine

turns.utterance: Yes I think there are far too many bullies in school.
turns.response: yes and I went to school in the 80's and had long straight hair, I did not fit in at all because everyone made their hair as big as they could

turns.utterance: I have long hair too! I learned to embrace it and not care what others think.
turns.response: I have not but not back then, I guess maybe if we could go back and know what we know not, I would love school

turns.utterance: Did you end up cutting your hair? Long hair is a sign of wisdom in some cultures.
turns.response: I did when I was younger, but I dont anymore, it is still long and straight

phrase: off the subject, i am thinking of cutting my hair.
did you end up cutting your hair?
